website_summaries.verdict: A mid-priced, slimline cellar from a well-respected manufacturer.
pros: Slim profile makes for a good fit in many areas of the home
cons: Cannot be built into a cabinet
Rare complaints of a humming noise

customer_reviews.title: Expect a limited life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in November 2013. It last about 4 years. The bottom is still chilling, but the upper compartment stopped chilling. It did the job well until it failed. It has a nice look - pretty much inconspicuous in the corner of the dining room. I never really used the pull out feature of the shelves. I just pulled the bottle right out. I might have had a couple of instances where the bottle was a bit too big, but not so much that it really stuck in my mind. If you do not mind having to replace it every 4 years or so, it is a good choice. At least it wasn't one of the $800 models.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Willis

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: I've actually had this cooler for a few years now and it is still chugging away with no problems whatsoever. I have it in my dining room which has a wood floor and it is whisper-quiet, even when the compressor is running. The most I hear is very low hum. As far as temperature control is concerned, it's pretty even, though sometimes it does go a couple of degrees cooler than my standard setting of 58-degrees, especially in hot weather. I suppose the compressor is working overtime. But all in all, this is a great storage unit for a small, temporary collection.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Love this wine refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Love this wine refrigerator! Fits perfectly in a nook in our pantry. Before purchasing I'd read reviews with people complaining of some wine fridges being too noisy, however, we don't hear noise from this one. Although we keep it in the pantry, we leave the pantry slightly open so there's plenty of air circulation, and we don't hear it. We're also frequently in there and don't hear it. Once I accidentally left mine open for 24 hours and was so scared that I broke it and I didn't! I just unplugged it for a few hours, plugged it back in and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Princessa Hagler

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: This unit was exactly what I was looking for, and it seems to be doing the job quite well. I am mystified by the reviews that say it is noisy. Mine hums more quietly than the refrigerator. After 2 1/2 years, I must amend this review. First, about a year ago, the upper chamber died. I made an inquiry to the company, but it was past warranty, and it would not have been worth it to repair. Yesterday, the lower chamber died as well. I realize that appliances don't last forever, but this was an especially bad buy. I would not consider this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: caprap

customer_reviews.title: A recommended add to your wine collection!
customer_reviews.text: This wine refrigerator has been great! It keeps the wine bottles at the perfect temperature and is easy to put bottles in and take them out. It is a little noisy, but sits in our kitchen and does not bother us. I would highly recommend this simple but powerful addition to your wine collection!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Carney

customer_reviews.title: Lasted awhile - good fridge and good company
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 4 years and it worked great until I moved it and it was in storage for 2 months. Now when I plug it up it just beeps. I called Wine Enthusiast and they said replacement operating board is just $19. Beats buying another. Good fridge and good company with service
customer_reviews.author: TC Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this wine fridge. It works as advertised and is just the right size for my needs. The only knocks, and they are minor, is that the interior lighting only lights up the top half and the control buttons are not illuminated.The fridge is in my home theater which is usually dark. I know the light button is on the far right so it is not that big of a deal to me that it is not lit. Overall I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Belisle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wine cooler
customer_reviews.text: So far it is keeping temperatures exactly as set. It is not silent, but very quiet- much quieter than a refrigerator. It came well protected and nicely packed. PROS: attractive exterior design quiet accurate temperature regulation CONS: champagne bottles do not fit well, as they have larger diameter than wine bottles separate doors for top and bottom would have been nice
customer_reviews.author: indygb

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but NOISY!
customer_reviews.text: Works well-enough. Takes a long-time to get to temperature, but after it does, it keeps them there. I've only had it for a month, so we'll see if it stays reliable. My biggest concern is the noise-level. Sounds like a computer fan that has something rattling. Do NOT put this in an area of your home where you talk or watch TV. It will be a major distraction.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Nunemaker

customer_reviews.title: Average while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Mine just died after 3 years & 4 months. It certainly looked nice but I would have been happier with it if it was able to ever achieve its coldest setting in either top or bottom zone. Now that I’m shopping to replace it, I won’t be reordering this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anthony Hornak

customer_reviews.title: It worked well for three of the five 1/2 years ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for three of the five 1/2 years I've owned it. For the last 2 1/2 years it has been very temperamental and will make beeping noises and just quit working. If I unplug it and let it sit for a while, it may/may not restart. Wine Enthusiast customer service is very difficult to get in touch with.
customer_reviews.author: Paula C Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Slim and trendy wine refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Slim and sleek wine refrigerator looks good just about anywhere you put it! It's great for a home office, game room, theater room or even a bedroom if you're so inclined. I've had mine for over 4yrs!
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Ignore the Bad Reviews
customer_reviews.text: I risked trying this out as I've used Wine Enthusiast coolers in the past. The reviews were not wrong, it is certainly not silent and I'd go as far to say it's not even quiet. I placed this in my living room which is close to my kitchen and it's as loud or louder than my regular fridge. I think if you can get past the constant hum it would be perfectly fine. It's just not what I want from a wine fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: PICK THIS ONE! So Happy with it!!
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally Happy!!! Just like the last few reviews, I spent HOURS researching this little bugger last December. I did let it stand upright over night before plugging in too. The Boyfriend was extremely happy when he opened this on Christmas and he has had it stocked ever since. No Problem with the temperature controls and we live in Phoenix. SO Happy I picked this model and We still get compliments all the time. It is set up in the Man Cave next to the Beer Fridge and we never hear any noises from it. PICK THIS ONE FOR SURE!
customer_reviews.author: Simplee Sweet

customer_reviews.title: 18 bottle touchscreen wine refrigerator-best in class!
customer_reviews.text: This slim line 18 bottle two zone wine chiller not only looks great, it is also whisper quiet and fits conveniently in narrow kitchen spaces. It brings wine to the desired temperature quickly, and the light in the upper chamber dramatically shows off on's collection of reds. I couldn't be happier. Great design, quality, and workmanship at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: JKessin

customer_reviews.title: Take Two
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Fridge as a shower gift. The first fridge didn't work, so we had to return it, it was kind of a hassle but once they got the second one, and it worked perfectly, they are very happy with the fridge and rave about the 2 temps zones. They love the size of the fridge, it fits anywhere!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tardif

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent. But really can't do the job in ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent. But really can't do the job in summer time, unless your AC is on in the hot days. But I still like to give high marks. It look nice, very low noise, and it operates as advertised. Almost a year past by, no problem yet.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon & Ling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: It is just how it was described. I love the size. It is just slightly taller than counter top height and its narrow design make it fit in well. It's really quiet and holds temperature well. Just wish light was on larger bottom section also. Did hold larger bottles well too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great refrigerator for wine contains 2 zones for my white ...
customer_reviews.text: Great refrigerator for wine contains 2 zones for my white and read. Very quite sitting on the corner and very elegant look to itt overall I give it a 5. the refrigerator is not cold enough for beer if you want it for beverage center.
customer_reviews.author: Great stuff

customer_reviews.title: I've had this several months now and it works as ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this several months now and it works as it should. Keeps proper temperature year round. The newer ones have a modified shelf so you can keep an opened bottle in it. Mine doesn't have this.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Ehrlich

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice....
customer_reviews.text: Read a few reviews ..not noisy at all! Very we'll built feels and looks sturdy..perfect size ..Works great , looks very clean line. Looks better in person (not so black a bit more mirrored or glass like...) and when the light is on..pretty! Love it ...
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Works well for over a year now
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over a year ago and everything works great. You have to remember to clean out dust filters on the back, or it will start making noise. The only reason it did not get 5 stars was that I can never remember which temperature display is for the top and which one is for the bottom. There should be some type of marking.
customer_reviews.author: RottzRule

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Like most of you, I read a LOT of reviews before deciding to go with this unit. Totally happy with it. Love the slim, stand-alone look of it, it holds 18 bottles nicely, love the dual temperature zones. And it's quiet and sharp looking too, even the digital display of the temps looks good on the front door of the unit. Would definitely recommend it, in fact I'll probably get another one so I can store more bottles. Friends who have come over always comment on how nice looking it is, and it's great to always have a bottle that's the perfect temp for immediate drinking.
customer_reviews.author: PDX Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice wine frig
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little wine frig. I like the taller design. It is quite stylish. I love the two zone feature. The eighteen bottles is just enough for our usage. I think even though this is free standing I might just build a little bar area around it. Shelves work pretty good. All and all a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Wife is happy, so I am !
customer_reviews.text: A great buy, my wife makes mead and this has made life better. No more monitoring temps in the closet! Only drawback would be the shelves, a bit cheap on an otherwise very nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect small space wine cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect small space wine cooler! I'm not sure what others were saying about noise, but it maybe has a little purr, but nothing offensive. Fits all of our bottles including pinot noir and holds the temps we set. Such a joy to be able to just pull the bottle we want and still have my regular fridg with room for food!
customer_reviews.author: Quilty Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We live in a small NYC apt and needed something slender and tucked away in a corner. This fits the bill. We've had the fridge for almost a month now and we've had no issues. The dual-zone temps are working great for both our whites and reds. The fridge is very quiet, even sitting a foot away from it as I type this review.
customer_reviews.author: NYer

customer_reviews.title: SLIMLINE WINE REFRIGERATOR FITS THE TICKET
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR. TWO TEMPERATURE COMPARTMENTS - VERY SLIM AND AFFORDABLE. THE PRODUCT ARRIVED ON TIME AND IS VERY GOOD LOOKING. THERE ARE LITTLE BLUE LED LIGHTS INSIDE YOU CAN TURN ON AT NIGHT AND IT LOOKS VERY COOL. WE HAVE IT IN OUR CABIN WHERE ROOM IS LIMITED BUT IT WOULD LOOK GOOD IN ANY SETTING- EVEN "POSH". THE FRONT HAS A MIRRORED LOOK EXCEPT IF THE INTERIOR LIGHTS ARE TURNED ON AT NIGHT. THE BOTTOM HALF REMAINS DARK EVEN WITH THE LIGHTS ON. THE LEGS ARE ADJUSTABLE FOR LEVELING. THE TOUCHSCREEN TEMPERATURE CONTROL IS EASY TO USE AND IS ILLUMINATED. WE LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: sandysatx

customer_reviews.title: Good but noisy.
customer_reviews.text: No issues with delivery or quality of product so far. Dual zones seem to work well. We don't have the unit in a main area where people normally are but if we did it might be a problem. It is pretty loud. You should consider that when purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L. Hodges

customer_reviews.title: it is not totally silent but it looks great and does the
customer_reviews.text: As others mentioned, it is not totally silent but it looks great and does the job
customer_reviews.author: Maisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks great at home, slim profile and quiet. i usually sit about 3 feet away and don't notice it.
customer_reviews.author: cmplaya

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly but noisy
customer_reviews.text: This cooler works perfectly. It makes more noise than I would prefer but it works reliably.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Willis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still working great in year two. SO nice to have wine at the temperature you wish.
customer_reviews.author: RobinMagpie

customer_reviews.title: this is a great wine frig
customer_reviews.text: great wine frid. bought it, love it. some noise but totally normal.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Dad
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I decided to order it! So glad I did...its perfect!! It fits in tight spaces, its quiet and 18 bottles is plenty...even for the wine maker himself!
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Apartment Wine Fridge!
customer_reviews.text: I still rent, so I did want something that would increase useable counter space as well as keeping resale value if I move. No complaints! It is super quiet and slick with an 18 bottle capacity, which is not too many nor few. I looked at 6/12 or then 24/36, so this is a nice in between.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hall

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for Limited Spaces
customer_reviews.text: Size, appearance and functionality are good but I would have liked instructions regarding wine temperatures for the unit. We are very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: LLK

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Quiet! I bought it as a present for my other half and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: mvagnich

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the dual temperatures quite well and isn't too noisy (contrary to some of the other reviews). All things considered, solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler! Holds Perfect Temp
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Cooler! The unit is attractive, space saving and most of all holds temperature despite fluctuating ambient temperatures. I have owned several different brands and this by far has been my favorite. The tinted door is a plus along with dual zones. Well worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice! Well made, hope it works, I gave it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: angie kerns

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient, but not built for Pinots
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, efficient and easy to operate, would have given 5 stars but the flaw (like many other wine coolers) is that it does not hold the larger Pinot or champagne bottles, so you lose a rack just to make space for them. Wish they would make one that accommodates Pinot bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Review of Wine Enthusiast 18-Bottle Touchscreen Wine Refrigerator.
customer_reviews.text: We've had the unit for about 2 months and it is working fine so far. Temperature control is accurate. The wine slot is tight for a larger bottle but not too inconvenient. The LED only lights the upper half of the interior. We need room lights to see the lower half. Your add says the top holds 10 bottles, bottom holds 8. It is reversed on our unit. Unit is fairly quiet, but seems to run continuously.
customer_reviews.author: Bob n Kay in Torrance

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for my husband
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator came on time and was packaged well. It is not loud at all, we have it in our dining room and you can not hear it. My husband has been really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband's birthday in February and he loves it! At this point we've had no problems with it whatsoever and the narrow style of it is perfect for small houses like ours.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Owens

customer_reviews.title: Correction to previous review
customer_reviews.text: The problem with only cooling to 54 degrees was caused by a power failure. The unit has to be reset when this happens. Everything is working as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Spade

customer_reviews.title: Love My Wine Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: After much time spent shopping for the best wine refrigerator, I selected this model to fit in the small space I had. It runs great and is quiet. I couldn't be happier with my selection.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A  Wessel

customer_reviews.title: This is a great wine cooler, you can rest assured you are getting quality here
customer_reviews.text: This wine cooler is awesome. I have had it for a while and it always maintains the temperature perfectly for me. There is such a difference in drinking my red a little chilled and the feature to have the whites on the bottom at 46 deg is perfect! I also love the thin design where kitchen space is at a premium. Overall, very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: KMJ

customer_reviews.title: Great wine refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Great wine refrigerator! Love how slimline it is. Both temps work really well. Larger bottles don't fit as well on the racks. Working great so far....
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Hruby

customer_reviews.title: Out in the garage it's fine.
customer_reviews.text: Not silent. Don't expect to keep it in your living space. Out in the garage it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Werle

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Looks nice. Runs quiet. It takes some time, at first, to reach the desired temperature, but once it does it maintains well. We've had it for a few weeks now and we are completely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Good wine fridge...
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem figuring out the temp adjustments... one set of up and down arrows for two temp settings. Played with it and figured it out. Great unit for the price and it it the perfect size for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice, beatifull wine cooler
customer_reviews.text: After I was looking for a cooler I decided to give a shoot to this good looking and space saver wine cooler. I am glad with it, Jorge
customer_reviews.author: JORGE PADRON

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Don't listen to bad reviews! This cooler is sleek and works quietly to keep our wine chilled to perfection!
customer_reviews.author: andrew schurle

customer_reviews.title: I love the slim design
customer_reviews.text: I love the slim design, depth, and quietness of this quality wine refrigerator. No regrets, holds the desired temp extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and pretty quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Looks classy. I've had this product 3 weeks. So far, so good. Very low buzzing sound when you're near it but pretty silent for the most part. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: AMNY

customer_reviews.title: I want to like it but.......
customer_reviews.text: it is just too loud. Some of the other reviewers mention the same problem. I have checked the level, it has lots of open air space around it, I let it sit a day before plugging it in but it just loud. At night you can hear the fans two rooms away. I love the look of it and it seems to hold temperature well but I hate the sound. I will return in hopes of getting another that is as quiet as some of the other reviewers have experienced.
customer_reviews.author: bigness

customer_reviews.title: Wine refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: This slimline wine refrigerator is great! Fits perfectly into small space, keeps wine at desired temperature and is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Irwin

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is great. Keeps your wine nice and cool. It lives in the kitchen and honestly, noise is not an issue. I can't hear it even in there. We're very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ajb

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm incredibly satisfied with my purchase. Once the unit reached the desired temperature, it was whisper quiet. It fits bottles of differing sizes and it is aesthetically appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Day

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It works great and is noiseless. I have it in my bar, at first you will hear low noise. That is expected as the fridge is trying to calibrate for the first time. After that it is noiseless. People love this product... I will recommend it to everyone. The delivery was as stated even with busy schedule during the festive period, it was still delivered on new year eve. The fridge was well protected inside and no scratches whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Whisper Quiet, Great Wine Fridge
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wine fridge about a month ago. So far it has been great. It holds 18 wine bottles, even opened bottles where I've reinserted the cork about halfway. It maintains the temperature very well between the 2 different zones and is an attractive fridge overall. Some people have complained that the fridge is noisy, but mine has been extremely quiet. I can't even tell it's running most of the time unless I stand right next to it. Overall I am very happy with my purchase and would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a good wine fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Love the slim fit.,
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular cooler because I had a small space to fit it it. It does the job perfectly. I followed the instructions and cooled the refrigerator before I put the wines in and it works beautifully. Best part, no noise!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Wachtel

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This wine refrigerator is perfect for our needs and the dual zones are wonderful. The temps stay consistent in both zones, runs quietly.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu10

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this wine refrigerator about 2 weeks ago. It is really nice looking, quiet and works fabulous. I love it and would highly recommend it. Our applicances are black and this looks great in the kitchen with them. It would also look great if you had stainless applicances. I have the reds set at 66 and the whites at 46 and it is perfect. A great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Convient SIze
customer_reviews.text: cionvient, slim and fits the space well. It has sufficent capacity to chill. WOrks as anticipated and would suggest its usage
customer_reviews.author: H. mack Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and professional design, works great
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, and it works well and looks great. It is the slimmest refrigerator I've seen, and looks very nice and militaristic.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The Wine refrigerator looks so much nicer in person. The mirror surface makes it look shiny and has led lighting that makes it look very expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Mike T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leery about ordering this product because of the noise issue experienced by some of the reviewers. I can say I have been using this product for a few weeks and it meets all of my expectations. I don't have have any noise issues at all, it is quiet and keeps the wine at the temperature that I have it set at, the two zones work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: James McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge!
customer_reviews.text: This wine refridgerator is great. It quite and it doesn't take up a lot of space. It is perfect for my needs. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: ykceralde

customer_reviews.title: its quite and i love the dual temperature control
customer_reviews.text: i realy love the duel temperature and the 18-bottle size fits purfectly for me :) lets just make sure it last more than 1 year
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: Wine Enthusiast 18-Bottle Touchscreen Wine Refrigerator (Slimline - 2-Temp)...
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and look of the wine refrigerator. It works fine so far, but the noise is noticeable. I have noticed wine refrigerators are louder than normal refrigerators.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good cooler. Looks good and works well. Delivered fast
customer_reviews.author: Tom Alto

customer_reviews.title: SO LOUD YOU HAVE TO TURN THE TV UP
customer_reviews.text: I have another Wine Enthusiast Wine fridge and it is so silent you can't hear it. This one hums so loud you have to turn the TV up in the next room. It's horrible. Don't buy. I'm returning it as soon as I can figure out how to ship it back. I feel like I have the humming tell-tale heart in the other room.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this item
customer_reviews.text: I Purchase this refrigerator is real loud . Is louder than my big refrigerator . If i would know I wouldnt purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Ootman

product_meta.title: Wine Enthusiast 18-Bottle Touchscreen Wine Refrigerator (Slimline - 2-Temp)
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
At last, a wine refrigerator for narrow spaces! Fits perfectly in those empty nooks & corners of your kitchen, living room, or any room Store & serve from 2 separate zones. This thermoelectric, energy-efficient, CFC-free wine cooler. . . Protects the taste of reds & whites w/ updated, virtually silent cooling technologyin 2 zones. Exterior digital touchscreen. ETL approved. Reflective Thermopane smoked-glass door w/ recessed handle and stainless trim. 4 pull-out chrome shelves. Interior LED lighting. Size: 37-1/2inH w/ hinge x 9-7/8inW x 20inD
feature_bullets: A thermoelectric, energy-efficient, CFC-free wine cooler. ETL approved.
Two zones: top holds 10 bottles, bottom holds 8. 7 pull-out chrome shelves. Exterior digital touchscreen with temperature display
Touch Screen Top Zone adjustable temperature range of 54-66°F provides ideal storing conditions for reds and whites

Touch Screen Bottom Zone adjustable temperature range of 46-66°F provides ideal storing conditions for reds and whites, and optimum serving conditions for most whites Exterior digital touchscreen with temperature display

18-bottle capacity***Note: Shelving is meant to hold standard Bordeaux size bottles, using larger size bottles may limit the capacity. If you would like to store larger bottles you can easily remove any of the shelves. This will also prevent scraping the labels on the larger bottles.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars114 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
